alert.note: Alert for Fremont; Natrona; Sweetwater (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 5:14PM MDT until July 03 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Riverton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Natrona County in central Wyoming... Southeastern Fremont County in central Wyoming... Northeastern Sweetwater County in south central Wyoming... * Until 600 PM MDT. * At 511 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were moving from Fremont County into Natrona County, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Split Rock around 515 PM MDT. Lysite and Castle Gardens around 525 PM MDT. Devil`s Gate, Lost Cabin and Cottonwood Pass around 530 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Ervay, Independence Rock and Red Wall. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: This is a DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are producing widespread wind damage across Fremont County. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows!
